sentence: Went to foxtail pool not realizing there was another small pool on the roof
I covered all the bases away from elevator upper floor not overlooking Foxtail Pool Club etc
SLS Hotel definitely seems to cater to a younger crowd as loud music played by the main pool but few people were really swimming
We also noticed that the second pool was quite small for the size of the hotel and pools closed rather early each night
Service at the pool was hit or miss
You have to stand in line to go the the main pool frustrating
Night clubs and pool partys can be noisy sometimes
Better still why not make a bigger pool for those who want to get away from the music instead of something so small which appears to be used for special events and rarely available to the public
One of the pools was closed for a private event when we went in the middle of the afternoon leaving the remainder of the hotels guests cramped into the beach lounge pool near the lobby

The pool however and the restaurants are amazing and I although I will not stay there again I would visit that hotel on a Sunday for there pool party which is where I imagine hotel properties do very well
Pool is nice but very loud
Pool closes At 7 alitle to early
Pools close at 7 pm
This hotel has a cool pool scene at the weekends and it draws a crowd if your looking for a peaceful chill out pool area this like many Vegas hotels is not the place as its a younger party crowd
We paid a lot of money for pool party at the Venentian and immediately wished we had not when as guests we walked into the Foxtail Pool Party for free and had a fantastic day
Oh and they close their pool at 7 pm but still have nerve to charge a resort fee

Pool area very nice and plenty of sun beds and seating area but the music was extremely loud so much so that you could not talk to anyone as they could not here what your were saying and there is no were to get away from it
Pool water is freezing as well but in 105 degree weather it was nice and the DJ was awesome
The pool was very good but the drinks are very expensive
The pool was nice but no one came to ask us for drinks
The pool area was nice did not see a hot tub but there were smaller pools for kids and lots of cabanas for privacy
You can not have a drink or even sit outhere near the pool on a sunny day
Lots of options in hotel boutiques cafe casino restaurants pool bar live music connects to the W The walls are thin so you can hear your neighbors
Staff was friendly I was expecting more of the pool and casino was a little bit small
We had the added benefit of having the pool open to allow for some more relax time in the sun around the pool
There is a gym spa pool casino and restaurants on site
Main pool outside near casino was still okay too cold to swim but the sun felt nice and there is a bar and DJs
Looks clean from outside of pool but when you go in I could see some of debres
Easy to find spots at pool that could be cleaned a little better though
Pool closes early and late
Every other hotel in this area has a better pool then this hotel
Outdoor pool was way nicer than I expected And they have a DJ sometimes
Regular pool umbrella upcharge
Young peoples paradise in vegas nice pool not lots of gaming a serious hook up joint lol
Live dj 12 to 6 by double pool area
They say it ’s for “ complimentary ” wifi and pool access etc etc
The downer for me is that you pay 34 a day for resort fees but the pool closes at 7 pm
So I open the lid to the milk and see there is a bug floating on top
I like the style of each room and I dislike that the pool area did not have it booth functioning

We did not receive the same room that was advertised when we booked the room it was still a nice room but just not the same one in the picture when we booked which was a little disappointing but other than that it ’s a nice hotel at the end of the strip very clean nice pool area for drinks and music
Pool area looked amazing but we were n’t there to swim
There is one other small european style pool read
did not like access to main pool area with everyone walking through desk pub restaurant casino areas
We had to use the first pool which also has a bar
And they added a service fee and tip automatically at the bar at the pool
Overpriced for the room and clothing disappeared all by it self from the room pools where good food was good as well
I was very disappointed with the staff who were n’t very helpful and also why would the pool close so early during the summer when the sun does n’t go down until 8 9 pm
Nice but pools close at 7 pm restaurants give u small portions
This hotel and this particular pool is advertised as family friendly but it really is nt
Amenities offered include a gorgeous pool casino on site of course a coffee shop for the morning a wonderful grill for afternoon evening and late night Burgers and fries
This hotel has everything you need a casino spa pool and restaurants
Pool was beautiful and there were plenty of chairs available
The main pool area was so much fun and clean as well which was great
The rooms are super spacious and beautiful it has a lot of casinos inside and as well as a rooftop pool which is super cool
Looks nice clean very updated the spa does n’t have a jacuzi
We loved our stay at sahara the only thing we did nt like was the the pool was not open
Great Eurpoean pool for the adults up a few levels
Wonderful place make sure your here when pool season starts just a couple of weeks early
Good customer service clean hotel good restaurant nice pool
